extendedInfo.description: Crime location powered by GPS technology.Are you moving? Night out? Going on holiday?The Crime guide is a useful and easy to use way of checking the safety of your area aswell as keeping your family safe and raising societies awareness of the high levels of crimes.By using this app, you are able to find upto 13 different crimes! Using real time data, find exactly how many crimes have taken place in your area or in a specific location of your choice, clearly laid out in google maps. On the map, zoom in to get the specific details of the crime.Crime data from the official police data of the whole United Kingdom. Regularly updated.

reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic
reviews.comment: Hooks up your gps and let\'s you know all the juicy crime data for your area, as well as map views and a handy crime and punishment search. Very quick and easy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC desire
reviews.comment: The best crime app on android, so easy to use
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Brilliant app..does what it supposed to do.. 5*

reviews.comment: Wow, a lot of crimes have happened around my area.
